nostalgia-articlepage:
'Content page' is used for NS_MAIN and any other non-standard namespaces.

{{Identical|Content page}}
nostalgia-create-this-page:
This is the text for the link leading to the edit form on pages that have not yet been created. See {{msg-mw|nostalgia-editthispage}} for when the page already exists.
{{Identical|Create page}}
nostalgia-deletethispage:
This is the text for link to delete the page in admin view, at the bottom of the page.
{{Identical|Delete this page}}
nostalgia-editthispage:
This is the "edit" link as used in the Nostalgia skin.

{{Identical|Edit this page}}
nostalgia-newmessageslink:
Link text to the user's talk page when they have new messages
{{Identical|New messages}}
nostalgia-newmessagesdifflink: Link text to a diff page with the last change to the user's talk page
nostalgia-projectpage: Used as link text in Talk page of project page.
nostalgia-protectthispage:
This is the text for link to protect the page in admin view.
{{Identical|Protect this page}}
nostalgia-talkpage: This is the text for link to discuss the page.
nostalgia-unprotectthispage:
This is the anchor text for the link to unprotect the page in admin view.
{{Identical|Unprotect this page}}
nostalgia-userpage: Used in user talk pages as the text of the link to the user page.
